about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey in Revive & Prosper Prologue, a captivating single-player factory builder! It is a one-map gateway to the world of Revive & Prosper.

IF YOU LIKE THE PROLOGUE, PLEASE ADD THE FULL GAME TO YOUR CART

Features:

  • Unleash your creativity as you construct a thriving base amidst landscapes you have revived with the mighty power of water.



  • Put an end to manual excavation. Eliminate the reliance on resource deposits. Employ the Digging Wheel to excavate soil and transfer it to the Sedimentation Machine, which will efficiently sort the soil into all the necessary resources you require.



  • Craft your industrial world from the ground up in this third-person base-building adventure with the help of delivering Catapults!



  • Golems work tirelessly using bonuses for faster constructing, digging, planting and cooking. However, they will decompose eventually, beckoning you to craft new companions. Extend their existence by generating Biomass in Biopress and supplying it to the golem factory, which they will utilize to rejuvenate their lifespan.



  • Be ready for changing weather that can impact your base. Rain can raise river levels, potentially causing floods if floodgates aren't opened promptly. Sandstorms provide wind for Windmills but can also lead to mild drought. Prepare for heat waves by storing water.


Immerse yourself in a world teeming with possibilities, where building, producing, and harvesting blend harmoniously with a living ecosystem.

name: R & P: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 @3.00 GHz / AMD FX-8320E Eight-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or ATI Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7Intel Core i3-10100F @ 3.60GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 3350G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 3050 or ATI Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Build and survive in Prologue to Revive & Prosper, a voxel base-building strategy. Cultivate food, gather resources, and control mutants. Remodel the terrain, and flow of water, build automated factories. Unlock the entire build menu by completing the map goal! Wishlist FULL Revive & Prosper game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Czech, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
